dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your account.
dashboard.changeAnytime: You can change your subscription preferences at any time
dashboard.chooseNotifications: Choose what email notifications you'd like to receive

faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our products. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.
faq.supportDescription: Our dedicated support team is here to help you with any questions or concerns. Get in touch with us for personalized assistance.

items.question: What is the return policy?
items.answer: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase for a full refund, provided it is in its original condition.

items.question: How do I track my order?
items.answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number. You can use this number on our website to track your order.

items.question: Do you offer international shipping?
items.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary depending on the destination.

items.question: Can I change my order after it has been placed?
items.answer: You can change your order within 24 hours of placing it by contacting our customer service team.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

items.question: How can I contact customer support?
items.answer: You can reach our customer support team via email at support@example.com or by calling 1-800-123-4567.

items.question: Are there any discounts for bulk purchases?
items.answer: Yes, we offer discounts for bulk purchases. Please contact our sales team for more information.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Manage your personal information and preferences

avatar.title: Your Avatar
avatar.description: To change your avatar, click on the image in this block and select a file from your computer to upload.

language.title: Your Language
language.description: To change the language of the application, select a language from the list and click save.
language.label: Language

email.title: Your Email
email.description: To change your email, enter a new email and click save. You will need to confirm the new email for it to take effect.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Reset password to enable email login
resetPassword.description: Resetting your password will allow you to sign in using your email and password in addition to your social login methods. You will receive an email with instructions to reset your password

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Permanently remove your account and all of its contents
deleteAccount.description: This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution

blog.shareArticle: Like this article? Share it with more people!
blog.author: Author

blocks.title: Component Library
